article.headline: Texas St. 103, Houston Baptist 76
article.story: SAN MARCOS, Texas -- Travis Jones had 23 points and 11 rebounds to lead Texas State to a 103-76 victory over Houston Baptist on Saturday. The Bobcats (5-2) blistered the nets all game long, hitting 61 percent from the field -- and 63 percent (10 of 16) from 3-point range. Jones and Eddie Rios both went 3-for-3 on 3-pointers. Rios finished with 17 points. Texas State raced to a 56-30 halftime lead as Jones scored 19 of his points before the break. Matt Staff added 11 points and John Bowman scored 10 for the Bobcats. Art Bernardi led the Huskies (2-6) with 20 points. Ronald March added 14 points and Tyler Russell scored 12 for Houston Baptist.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
